event.title: was unanimously approved by the DeKalb City Council Monday

data.event: A pilot program that aims to tidy DeKalb neighborhoods was unanimously approved by the DeKalb City Council Monday.
The Neighborhood Improvement Coordination Effort, or NICE program, will kick off during NIU Cares Day – a day devoted to performing volunteer work in the community – which is April 18 this year.
